roleset.name: dubious, able to be questioned

role.descr: person the question is directed at, hearer

roles.note: args 0 and 2 expected to be rare.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Prosecutors in Port St. Lucie, Fla., said the victim's identification of McIntyre as the suspect was questionable.
example.arg: the victim's identification of McIntyre as the suspect

example.name: rare arg2
example.text: The prisoner was finally questionable once the truth serum took effect.
example.arg: once the truth serum took effect

example.name: args0, 1
example.text: If the right was questionable by the legislature, the right of the legislature to question it could not be disputed;

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WSJ data, question-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls interrogate-37.1.3.
